Description:
Outstanding proportions in superb court location.
Standing proudly in a quiet location, this four bedroom residence is a welcome find for those seeking a new family abode. Set on an astounding 966m2 (approx.) allotment, ideal for those seeking all the accommodation the family could ever want and need with big extras. The possibilities are endless and we will welcome all buyers to inspect. This delightful light filled, immaculately presented residence consists of four bedrooms, study, central bathroom, three living areas including lounge/dining and neat kitchen. Externally the home boasts a charming wrap-around veranda surrounded by established gardens and lawn for children or pets to enjoy, as well as an extended 7.4m X 9m four car garage at the rear of the property. A super central location, close to local schools and shops while being also convenient to Corio Shopping Centre, Bell Post Hill Shopping Centre and Ring Road access. This is an outstanding home in a family friendly location that is absolutely ideal for first home buyers, families and investors alike.
Insights: 21 Redfearn Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Neat As A Pin
Conveniently located on a level block lies this beautiful 3 bedroom home comprising of a large open lounge room, bright kitchen with adjoining meals area and spacious bedrooms. Set on a large allotment of approximately 542sqm, there is plenty of space in the rear yard. Additional features include split system air conditioning, gas heating and polished floor boards throughout. Currently let at $240pw until March 2019, the home is a great investment opportunity or place to call your own.

Description:
The One You Have Been Waiting For
Set on approx. 612 sqm, this home boasts a highly sought after location in a dead end court, meaning next-to-no passing traffic, great quiet neighbours, yet only minutes from all the local amenities including Aldi, Geelong Gate Homemaker Centre, Corio Central Shopping Centre, public transport & access to the ring road/Princes Highway. Geelong CBD, just 10-15 minutes & Melbourne under an hour! Also close access to walking tracks & Hendy Street Reserve for the kids. Northern Bay College an easy 15 minute walk or 3 minutes by car & Corio train station 5 minutes drive.
* 4 great sized bedrooms, master with WIR & ensuite
* Fully equipped kitchen with gas cooktop, dishwasher & huge corner pantry
* Family bathroom, shower, bath and separate toilet
* Open plan living/dining with split system A/C & gas heating
* Double garage with drive through access
* Large undercover paved entertaining area
* Huge open canvas yard with scope for extra garage/shed (STCA)
With lack of supply of properties in this highly sought after pocket currently on the market, be sure to inspect before it is too late!
Insights: 4 Agathea Close, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2019 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Location Is The Key
Set on a corner allotment of 579m2 in the Residential Growth Zone and in the heart of Corio this property truly is a close-to-everything brick veneer home. The home offers 3 bedrooms plus a study all serviced by a central bathroom. Lounge room located at the front of the home comes with split system heating and cooling and the very serviceable Kitchen overlooks the back yard. Stepping outside you will find a neat and tidy garden with garage, all locked securely behind high gates. The position of this property is perfect, being located within walking distance to everything, including shopping centre and only minutes away from schools, doctors, public transport and easy highway access. Don't miss this opportunity as this property must sell.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Wonderful first home or investment.
Location, location, location! This fantastic home has to be one of the best entry level properties you can buy in the rapidly growing pocket of Corio!
This well presented property comprises of a light filled and spacious lounge upon entry. The delightful kitchen/meals area comes complete with ample bench and cupboard space and an electric cook top. Three comfortable sized bedrooms, two with built in robe's, plus a central bathroom with separate toilet. Other features include: s/s air conditioning, laundry, low maintenance yard and a double carport.
Only a short walk to local schools, Shopping centres, sporting facilities and the Princes highway right at your door what more could you ask for. Call to inspect today.

Description:
Powerful potential.
Picture perfect this immaculate family home is ideal for the astute buyer to secure an appealing asset nestled on a generous allotment of approx. 530m2 right in the heart of the Cloverdale Estate. Currently occupied by great long term tenants for $300pw investors should definitely put this property on the top of their shopping list. The home boast four bedrooms in total (three with BIRS's), a spacious lounge/dining area, neat timber kitchen overlooking a second living space, central bathroom, double carport plus a generous rear yard. Situated in an established neighbourhood the home provides easy access to the local shopping strip, public transport and multiple reserves. Only a two minute drive away to Corio Shopping Centre, Ring Road and schools for all ages makes this an ideal location. Neat as a pin this property provides powerful potential for its new owner.

Description:
Character and charm with refreshing appeal.
A family home with an abundance of living space all positioned on an allotment of 557m2 (approx.) located in an increasingly popular area to live, surrounded by a beautiful garden setting and only minutes drive from the Geelong CBD, local schools, Medical facilities, Corio shopping centre and the Melbourne ring road at your doorstep.
This well-loved home comprises of three bedrooms all with built in robe's, a light filled lounge upon entry which then flows to the kitchen/dining area complete with ample cupboard and bench space, a dishwasher and an upright stove.
Continue out into the rear of the home and you are greeted by a perfectly manicured garden with an undercover bbq area, two car garage with workshop and a gazebo perfect for storing all your gardening tools.
Loaded with character this home offers great value for home owners and for those wanting to step into the property market.

Sensational solid brick home.
This stylish brick home is perfectly positioned close to public transport, schools, Corio shopping centre and the Princes highway practically at your door.
The home itself features three spacious bedrooms, two with built in robe's, excellent front formal lounge bathed in natural light with gas heater, central bathroom and kitchen/dining with ample cupboard and bench space. With all the hard work done this home is a neat and complete package inside and out that is sure to impress.

Perfect for the first home buyer, investor or those looking to upsize. Positioned to perfection and sure to sell quickly this home won't last so call now to book your private viewing today.

- Spacious 591sqm block
- Currently tenanted at $305.00 per week to long term, great tenants
Don't miss this one, inspection is a must!

Description:
Beautiful Family Home With Subdivision Potential (STCA)
Living the fine life in this distinguished family home is more affordable than you would think, this is a property you will truly want to call your own. This gorgeous family home is set right in the heart of Corio, boasting a beautiful sense of style and comfort like no other and offering ideal subdivision potential for further development (STCA).
Featuring large light filled spaces, quality floors front to back and a flexible floor plan including three large bedrooms all including built in robes. Centrally located family bathroom, a generous size laundry with ample storage and bench space and a separate toilet adjacent.
A galley style kitchen includes modern finishes, timber bench-tops, tiled splash-back, dishwasher, gas cooktop and ample cupboard space while adjacent is the dining area and a very spacious living room that overlooks the streetscape.
Quality fixtures and fittings throughout this home compliment the sophistication and modern lifestyle, combined with indoor/outdoor entertaining perfect for all seasons. Ample secure off-street parking and a back yard for growing little football stars!
All comprised on a large sun soaked 689m2 (approx) allotment accompanied by low-maintenance gardens offering you heaps of privacy. Set in one of Corio's most established streets with a potential rental return of approximately $300-$320pw, this home boasts easy access to the primary & secondary schools, Corio Shopping Village, easy access to the surf coast and the Geelong Ring Road - Simply move in and enjoy!
Insights: 75 Plantation Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Upgrade on a Budget
This family home has everything you need to keep the family peace and best of all, is the affordable price bracket. Offered with the large main lounge plus formal dining that leads to the well-appointed solid timber kitchen with loads of bench and cupboard space and is open to the family room. From here head into the enclosed alfresco which allows for entertaining all year round or even can be used an area for the kids to play come rain, hail or shine. With an en suite to the master, a hidden office/storage room, reverse cycle air conditioner, floating timber floors and security shutters that provide for energy savings, security and privacy. With ample backyard space there is ample scope to add touches make it yours. With Corio Central Shopping centre, schools, transport plus other shops close by, even gaining access to the Ring Road is a breeze. Make the move and end your search.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Hard To Find, Impossible To Forget
Located just moments away from everything with privacy at another level with no opposing neighbours, just a short 5 min walk from the huge Sutcliffe Reserve where they welcome dogs off lead. Only a 1 minute drive from the entrance to the ring road, Melbourne 55 mins away, Geelong CBD 15 mins, Torquay and the rest of the surf coast only 30 mins drive. Public transport is aplenty with bus stops going in either direction just a 6 min walk from this location (Bus route 22 , 23 & 10). Also just a 5 min drive from Corio Central where you will find everything you need including choice of supermarkets, Kmart, Best & Less, various banks, pharmacies, 7/11 & much more!
* 3 bedrooms, (2 with BIRs)
* Central bathroom with separate shower and bathtub
* Spacious kitchen with plenty of storage and adjoining meals area
* Lounge area complete with gas heating & split system heating/cooling
* Freshly painted throughout
* Bonus living area leading out into the backyard
* 3 car carport plus single lock up garage
Nest or invest. A spectacular opportunity to purchase in Geelong's largest growth area.

Description:
Solid Investment Or Fantastic First Home
Conveniently located, this three-bedroom home will be in hot demand for both savvy investors and first homeowners. With a neat fresh feel the home is ready to move in with scope to make subtle upgrades and further add value with your own personal touch. The large living room set at the front of the home is complete with gas heating and air-conditioning for year-round comfort. It further leads through to a spacious second living and meals area, adjacent to the light filled kitchen boasting ample bench and storage space. All three bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom with bath, a separate shower and toilet. Outside there is ample backyard space for the kids to play behind secure gates and a paved patio accessible from the second living room. This great home is within easy reach of Corio Village and walking distance to local schools, public transport and shopping, including Aldi, Corio. In just a couple of turns you can head into Geelong via the Princes Highway or to Melbourne on the Ring Road making for an easy commute.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 6 Sharland Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Golden opportunity.
Sale by SET DATE 8/12/2018 (unless sold prior)
Offering a golden opportunity to secure a lavish 707m2 approx. block of land, boasting main road exposure right in the heart of the exploding Corio suburb directly opposite the Corio Shopping Centre. Buy today to begin building immediately (STCA).
With access to most major amenities right at your doorstep and within walking distance of Shell Reserve and schools for all ages, this exceptional block of land is one of a kind in the area.
This rare find is perfect for anyone looking to build their dream home and save on stamp duty, or for builders/developers looking to make a quick profit by building 2 or maybe 3 units (STCA).
This is a fantastic opportunity for all investors and buyers!
Insights: 92 Bacchus Marsh Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Ideal Development/Investment Opportunity!
Situated on a corner block of 594m2 (approx), less than 1km from Corio Central major shopping centre, public transport, doctors, primary schools and childcare, this is an ideal property for the astute investor!
The solid home comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, a functional kitchen with good cupboard & bench space, gas hotplates and electric oven. The meals and living area offers floorboards, air conditioner and gas heater.
Outside there is a double garage with bathroom and sauna at the rear. The property is currently tenanted at $250pw till May 2019.
Collect an income while you make plans for further development (STCA). This is an opportunity not to be missed!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.

Description:
Immaculate Family Home
Whether you are looking to get into your first home, starting your portfolio or adding to it, this three bedroom home is fantastic value. Situated on a large 553m2 allotment and located within walking distance to schooling and amenities this property represents great value for any purchaser. On entry you are greeted by a generously sized formal lounge room. The three well proportioned bedrooms are serviced by the centrally located family bathroom, kitchen/meals area has excellent cupboard space. Laundry and separate toilet round out this beautifully kept family home. Outside we have a large secure north facing rear yard, single garage and garden shed. This property will tick all the boxes. Inspection a must!
Insights: 87 Colorado Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.
